def_cn: （人）机会主义的，投机取巧的
def_en: If you describe someone as opportunist, you are critical of them because they take advantage of any situation in order to gain money or power, without considering whether their actions are right or wrong.

def_cn: （行动）临时起意的，抓住机会的
def_en: Opportunist actions are not planned, but are carried out in order to take advantage of a situation that has just occurred.
